interfaces.name: File
FileSystemItem
Node
NotepadEvents
interfaces.sourceCode:
export interface NotepadEvents {
  file_name?:string,
  path?: string | undefined,
  data?: string
  type: AppEvents
}

export enum AppEvents {
  TAB_CHANGE,
  TAB_CREATE,
  TAB_DELETE,
  WORKPAD_UPDATE,
  WORKPAD_SAVE_REQUEST,
  WORKPAD_SAVE_RESPONSE,
  FILE_SYSTEM_OPEN,
  FILE_SYSTEM_READ
}

interfaces.name: Tab
interfaces.sourceCode:
export interface Tab{
  id: number,
  title: string,
  isClosable: boolean,
  selected: boolean,
  path: string | undefined
}

methods.name: saveFile
methods.rawdescription:
Saves the file contents on the choosen directory.
If the file is not present then creates the file with the specified name and then stores the content .
If the file is present it stores the content in the exsisting file
